name: Project Bomboid
description:
!!!This is alpha version!!!

Project Bomboid is an open-ended zombie-infested sandbox. It asks one simple question – how will you die? 

In the towns of Mudrau and Everest Point, survivors must loot houses, build defences and do their utmost to delay their inevitable death day by day. No help is coming – their continued survival relies on their own cunning, luck and ability to evade a relentless horde.
